author: hillion
msg: Enhanced robustness of the CSS engine.

author: deweese
msg: 1) FlowText now supports clicking on anchors.
2) Fix for drawing to destinations that do not have alpha.
3) Made the Anchor related Listeners public so FlowText could use them

author: tkormann
msg: - commit Nicolas' patch. Dynamic modification on tspan are now supported.
The only minor changes I made is on the layout of the source code to
follow the coding conventions we have in batik.
* all classes in the bridge are at least protected

author: tkormann
msg: filter, mask, clip, gradient, pattern... are now updated when the
geometry of the referencing graphical elements are dynamically modified.
